= Welcome to Our Wiki =
This is the main page of our wiki. You can find useful links below:
== Important Pages ==
* [[Getting Started]] * [[User Guide]] * [[Project Documentation]]
== About ==
This wiki contains documentation for our project. Feel free to browse around!
[[File:sample_image.jpg|thumb|300px|This is a sample image]]
== External Links ==
* [https://github.com/ GitHub] * [https://www.mediawiki.org/ MediaWiki]

= Getting Started =
Welcome to the getting started guide. This document will help you begin using our product.
== Installation ==
To install the software, follow these steps:
# Download the installer from our website # Run the installer # Follow the on-screen instructions # Restart your computer
== Configuration ==
After installation, you need to configure the software:
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Setting ! Description ! Default Value |- | Port | The network port to listen on | 8080 |- | Log Level | Verbosity of logging | INFO |- | Auto Update | Whether to check for updates automatically | true |}
== Troubleshooting ==
If you encounter any issues, please see the [[User Guide#Troubleshooting|Troubleshooting section]] in the User Guide.
[[File:setup_diagram.png|center|500px|Setup diagram]]

= User Guide =
This comprehensive user guide will help you use our software effectively.
== Features ==
Our software includes the following features:
* Data analysis * Reporting * Export to various formats * Collaboration
== Math Support ==
The software supports mathematical formulas:
f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^x e^{-t^2} dt
And also inline formulas like E = mc^2.
== Troubleshooting ==
=== Common Issues ===
Here are some common issues and their solutions:
* '''Application won't start''': Check that all dependencies are installed * '''Slow performance''': Try clearing the cache * '''Export fails''': Ensure you have write permissions to the output directory
=== Error Codes ===
|+ Error Codes |- ! Code ! Description ! Solution |- | E001 | Database connection error | Check database credentials |- | E002 | Invalid input format | Review the input file format |- | E003 | Out of memory | Increase available memory
